column8: Izzy has quickly established herself as an extremely sought after stylist.
column9: Her natural flair with creating beautiful, wearable styles has built her a strong following.
column10: Izzy recently won the National Redken Style Innovator award. She is also a specialist in extensions.

column8: Salon manager Kelly has 14 years experience working in Warrington town centre.
column9: She is the team leader of the salon.
column10: She specialises in long hair styling and is also one of the extension experts within the salon.

column8: Jo is a fantastic stylist with many years experience, she's a real long standing asset to the team.
column9: Her down to earth nature instantly puts you at ease and her hairdressing skills really shine.
column10: She loves doing men and women's hair. Book well in advance - she's a very busy stylist.

column8: Brad joined the team at the end of last year and is already full settled into PK life. He's 23 and has built up a diverse range of skills over the 3 years he's been hairdressing.
column9: He loves creating balayage's and vivid colour melts.
column10: Brad is a full time stylist and his friendly, relaxed approach makes him a perfect addition to the team.

column8: Abi is an extremely progressive hairdresser and has recently been promoted to a Stylist.
column9: She produces some beautiful cuts, colours and styles.
column10: Her friendly, approachable personality ensures she always gets 5 star feedback from her clients.

column8: David is the latest addition to the PK team. He is a progressive Graduate stylist with loads of natural flair and a mega friendly personality.
column9: He completed his apprenticeship at the highly respected Andrew Collinge Graduates then spent a few months at our Base Academy. He's now a fully fledged member of the PK team and is looking to build his client base.
column10: He's now a fully fledged member of the PK team and is looking to build his client base.
